sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action will post incident details in a Workplace by Facebook Group.

Inputs:

  • Incident - The incident record which would be posted to Workplace by Facebook.
  • Additional Message - Add a message before the record details.
  • Override Default Fields - Provide a comma separated list of field names to send instead of the defaults fields from the incident record. E.g.caller_id, urgency, assigned_to.
  • Group ID - The Workplace by Facebook group ID to post the incident details to.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • Post ID - ID of the Facebook post for an incident record. Will be populated in case of success.

Error Messages:

  • Group ID not found.
  • OAuth access token is not valid.
  • The credentials associated with the Workplace by Facebook Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.

To use this action, the corresponding Workplace by Facebook connection and credential must be created and associated with the Workplace by Facebook Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
